QuestData.Title: Moonglade Calls
QuestData.Description: I have received word that our brothers in Moonglade have requested your help, $n. You should travel there and speak with Loganaar in Nighthaven. He will tell you all you need to know.
QuestData.LogDescription: Travel to Moonglade and speak with Loganaar in Nighthaven.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Travel to Moonglade and speak with Loganaar in Nighthaven.
